availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Kaibar (Kenton County, Kentucky, landlord and grocer)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, landlord and grocery store owner. Native of Bavaria. Married to Matilda Kaibar. Father of Louisa Kaibar, Cordelia Kaibar, Peter Kaibar, Sarah Kaibar, Emma Kaibar, Lydia Kaibar. Landlord in Kenton County in 1860. Grocery store owner in Kenton County in 1860. Employed Peter Kaibar as a clerk in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 7, p. 302A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 7, p. 874.
Find A Grave, "Peter Kaibar, Sr. (1815-1880)," Memorial 146165093, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146165093 (accessed April 8, 2020).
